XPSPLprocessorsignalError¶

The error event

Methods¶

__construct¶

__construct([$error = false[, $exception = false]])¶

Constructs a new signal.

Parameters:
  • $error (string) – Error message.
  • $exception (object|null) – Exception object if exists
Return type:

void

get_error¶

get_error()¶

Returns the error message.

Return type:string

get_exception¶

get_exception()¶

Returns the exception, if set.

Return type:object|null
